programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Mademoiselle Lapin s'est blessée à la cheville. Sa soeur et ses amis proposent alors de la remplacer au stand de glaces, au supermarché et aux autres endroits où elle travaille...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Royaume de Gros-Dodo) S6 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Le Royaume de Gros-Dodo»All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique»After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Kiko's Song) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Kiko's Song»Kiko's Song: When the coquis of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence. (S2, ep 8a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur»Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rocky-Bye) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Rocky-Bye»Rocky-Bye: Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky. (S1, ep 12b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le patinage) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le patinage»There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Sleepover) S2 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Sleepover»Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra's house. Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant are all coming to the sleepover too. The girls are are too excited to go to sleep. They stay up playing games and having fun. They play songs on a piano, have a midnight feast and take it in turns to tell a story. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les étoiles) S2 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Les étoiles»George loves space and when he needs to sleep, he turns on his space mobile. Peppa doesn't understand that until Daddy Pig tells her about the stars. And when she gets to look through the telescope at Grandpa Pig, Peppa is over ... the space is super!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (31/78)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (32/78)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party) S8 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party»Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Tous en scène !) S2 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Tous en scène !»When a mysterious ghost is causing havoc around the Lookout,The pups discover it's not a ghost at all - it's Marshall... sleepwalking!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde»Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Busy Baby: Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark. (S1, ep 14b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (28/78)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (30/78)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Freddy Fox) S3 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Freddy Fox»Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Great Spring Clean) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «The Great Spring Clean»Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pneus fabuleux) S4 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Pneus fabuleux»When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La Course au Trésor) S3 (17/20)
programme.desc: «La Course au Trésor»When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Monsieur Hellinger s'illumine / Le portrait de la princesse) S8 (11/24)
programme.desc: «Monsieur Hellinger s'illumine / Le portrait de la princesse»When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur) S8 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur»When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Berry Bad»Berry Bad: Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes. (S1, ep 19b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Mademoiselle Lapin s'est blessée à la cheville. Sa soeur et ses amis proposent alors de la remplacer au stand de glaces, au supermarché et aux autres endroits où elle travaille...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Royaume de Gros-Dodo) S6 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Le Royaume de Gros-Dodo»All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique»After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Kiko's Song) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Kiko's Song»Kiko's Song: When the coquis of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence. (S2, ep 8a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur»Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rocky-Bye) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Rocky-Bye»Rocky-Bye: Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky. (S1, ep 12b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le patinage) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le patinage»There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La course rigolote) S3 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La course rigolote»Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en bateau de Polly) S3 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en bateau de Polly»Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (35/78)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (36/78)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fait de la pâtisserie) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Blue fait de la pâtisserie»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre) S8 (22/24)
programme.desc: «Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre»Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (34/78)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»The Great Friendship Show: Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting. For Ron, it's poetry. (S1, ep 34).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (35/78)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (36/78)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle emmène Peppa et ses amis pour une balade en train, où elles devront cocher ce qu'elles voient sur leurs feuilles d'activité...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be done) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be done»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Chocolat et boules de neige) S4 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Chocolat et boules de neige»It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La famille Pickle en camping) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La famille Pickle en camping»When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican»When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.
